title: BRIEF-Waddell & Reed Financial, Inc. Announces February 28, 2018 Assets Under Management
text: March 12, 2018 / 8:41 PM / in 9 minutes BRIEF-Waddell & Reed Financial, Inc. Announces February 28, 2018 Assets Under Management Reuters Staff March 12 (Reuters) - Waddell & Reed Financial Inc: * WADDELL & REED FINANCIAL, INC. ANNOUNCES FEBRUARY 28, 2018 ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT * WADDELL & REED FINANCIAL INC - ‍PRELIMINARY ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT OF $81.4 BILLION FOR MONTH ENDED FEB 28, 2018, COMPARED TO $84.3 BILLION ON JAN 31, 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
